Text:
The file, though its extension is ".avi" must be uncompressed (7zip, for instance).
It opens a folder called "bottle-gf-drunk" inside which is the real file "BOOZED_GF.wmv".

It's a 5mn movie which in my opinion isn't that interesting (a poor orgy with a call-girl, I suppose).

Another file called "pcs.r01" which must be unzipped also contains pictures and links to some websites.

All that should have been said by the "anonymous" author of this torrent...
